QuestData.Title: Cry For The Moon
QuestData.Description: I'm hopeful, but let's remain professional. It's business as usual for this one.$B$BInto the guillotine he goes... and if the alchemy doesn't take, he won't be getting back out of it.$B$BJitters and I will attend to this. Please, just stand back and watch from a safe distance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Watch Oliver Harris and Jitters attempt to cure the Lurking Worgen.
QuestData.CompletionText: Excuse me, we're not done yet.
QuestData.RewardText: Success... Finally! I can't thank you enough for giving me the chance to work the cure myself.$B$BOur new friend may be in need of some help as well. You might want to speak with him.
